sources.name: FileSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FileSource

sinks.name: StageData
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StageData
